name: Super Hoarder 64
description:
Welcome to Super Hoarder 64!

You are rooming for the night with a hoarder and they want to give you something for being a good guest. Unfortunately, they lost the key to their chest, so you have to get it for them. Their house is very secure and you will need to find some other items they may have lying around in order to get to the key and receive your prize!

Controls:

Movement - WASD or Arrow Keys

Menu Controls - Mouse Left Click

Thank you for playing our game! This was for the Kenney Jam in August 2022 and was made in 48 hours with the theme of Growth. We have a small size changing mechanic along with the growth of your supplies as you go through the hoarders house. I hope you enjoy it!
